information.name: backup-sync-dropbox
information.description: This plugin handles synchronization of your UNMS backups to a Dropbox folder.
information.author: Ubiquiti Inc.

configuration.label: UNMS API token
configuration.description: You can create UNMS API token in Network -> Settings -> Users.

configuration.label: Dropbox access token
configuration.description: You can get Dropbox access token in the Dropbox App console, see readme for more information.
